topics.body: Please shut up, I'm not even close to bad at this.

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598bf4c636872506b0013aa#post_5598bf4c636872506b0013aa

Forget us! We're just a bunch of assholes on a pony site! Do something now!

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598bf9e6368720b4e0007fc#post_5598bf9e6368720b4e0007fc

Dude, you can't lay something heavy like that on us and just expect us to be all "cool, man". We care about you, and by extension, your family.

Please

You _might_ not be able to do shit, but you don't know until you _try_. Worse comes to worse, you've got your dad for backup.

Is she still texting you?

Ask her where she is, And if she tells you try getting your Dad to Drive up there and fined her.

Or call 911. And ask them to help fined her.

topics.author: 50a843d47f123b2e7c001359

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598c06e636872508200124e#post_5598c06e636872508200124e
The best thing you can do is the right thing, the second best thing is the wrong thing.

The worst thing you can do is nothing at all. Never ever do nothing at all.
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598c0e66368720b4e00095a#post_5598c0e66368720b4e00095a

Never, ever, take that risk. Speaking from my own experiences and having a friend with suicidal tendencies, it's very difficult for others to know when you're "bluffing" (quotation marks because when you have those tendencies, it's never really a bluff, even if you won't actually do anything) and when you're serious.

It's your sister. Why take the risk?
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442
